this journal is old. (if you havent noticed)

my new thingy is  <<           jade84

 plain and simple.

ok.

i got my allergies tested and like im allergic to tons of things this sucks.and i have athlets athsma.

it was preety fun. our outfits were kewl. i think im going to take up Pointe.

Clovis is being an ass. i big big big ass.

why is everything bad happening to me!!!!!!!!!!!!!...

did i do something wrong???

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

i got new dance shoes they really nice. 

now i have to go to summer school math GRADE 8
that pissed me off.
but i learned that if i pass it they will bump me up a grade in math. so when im in the 7th grade i will have 8th grade math. finally i wont be considered an idiot.

my plan next year is to spend all my time in the art room.
ignore everyone. im sick of them. 

camping was awsome.
i meet these guys. Dallus and Jacob. they were fun / ny.
they had a lot of weed on them too. teehehee ;)

>>>>>>>>>>i have more to say but i forgot what. 
whatever<<<<<<<<

i cant stand it when people point at me. i hate when people point.

its been a really long time.
schools out.
jesus is leaving.
diamound is leaving.

im sick of every one hating me. ive never done anything to them. every one still hates me, its the way its always been. my so called "mother" hates me too. she takes so many of her problems out on me. she yells at me for no reason. so i have become "mute" around her. so she always asked me questions of what has happened to her "sweet little girl." she dosnt realize that im not her "sweet little girl." she hates me any way. why does it matter? 
im hidding to many things. im always about to cry. before i came to SASA everything was perfect, looks didnt really matter. my "mother" wasnt lesbian. i mean i dont have a problem with her being lesbian it just that she had boyfriends and she liked men. and BAM when she gets out of colledge SHIT SHES LESBIAN. 
and im not preety so to hell with a guy liking me.
 why is everything based on looks?

im going camping. not tommarow but the day after. yey!! 
i love camping. im gonna get a tan. ill be the tru British Bitchy Indian, i am.


done for now...

brandy (my dog) was trying to eat rass again (my bunni)

Shelby just got the smile empty sould cd and shes gonna burn it for me. yay! ohh & some other cd.

i was in the red eye cafe the other day and omg there was this painting there. Ohh it was AWSOME!!!!! you HAVE to go and see it. actually there are a few of them. one is of the gates of hell in the winter time and there is a chariub outside of it blowing a horn. the other one is of hundreds of faces (well thats how i inturpreted it)
its brownish and red mostl with lots of other colors. an other one is of the old water main. there is a fence in it and barbed wire. there are lots of other reall good paintings there too... GO AND SEE THEM!

i was at the tatoo shop whachen this girl get a tatoo and she was getting it on her back. it was of a spider. i was talking to Jim and he just got the sides of his cheaks peirced. both sides too. since mum is thinking about me getting my nose peirced i was talking about it with him. and he said that he wouldnt be able to do it with a gun. grrrr! i hate thoes needles there so long and thick.
when i do get it done its not going to be a hoop. its gonna be a little stud. nothing big.

 goodbye...

 oo yeah. when i die, i dont want an open casket.

i got new colors. i think. im not sure if they changed or not...

now i cant get a pool pass. cuz the pool opened today so for the whole fricked summer i cant go swimming!!!!!!!!!!!!
MY LIFE SUCKS!!!!!!!!!!!
EVERYTHIG BAD HAPPENES TO ME!
NOW FOR THE WHOLE SUMMER I CANT GO SWIMMING!!
arg...
maybe they the might let me still go in but i dont think they will.

this year suck sorta. everything went wrong. i wish it was like last year. and everyone is chaging schools because they hate SASA so much. Jesus is leaveing. :(
hes my buddy too. ill miss him.

i think i gonna go over Cheses house later. He will cheer me up.

today was good. today was really good.

there was a sasa new thingy about superstions and it was the best one of the year. and we had a pizza partay in the art room.
then i got the Jet cd, then the Switch Foot cd, then the ROB ZOMBIE/WHITE ZOMBIE cd. i love ROB ZOMBIE/WHITE ZOMBIE!!!!!!

i wish my last name was zombie. that would be so kewl. 

                     !~JADE ZOMBIE~!

but mums really on my case cuz of my issue with time and my middle name. See i cant exactlly tell time. Yeah, sounds dumb but i dont care. i can tell time just not tell it.
i can tell you its 6:43 right now but i cant tell you how on a regular clock or how long something will be. know what i mean?
and god its a whole new story on the middle name thing. jesus. why dont i just change it? my middle name is 

 elisabeth or elizebeth or elisabeth or ellizebeth or elezabeth. hell i dont noe. 


the only thing that made me sad today was...
how i hate most of the 8th graders not all of them thoe. and the ones that i like are leaveing. i mean... 
i still like andrew a little but i think i like the idea of him more than him himself. i dont noe. it sound imature. but...
i dont noe. on the bus he was rubbing my neck and my cheak.
and he looked at me the way he did when we were going out.
 arrrggggggggggg!! this is so hard to explain!!!!!!!!!!!

i dont like HIM. but i like HIM. 
love/hate situation.

o well.

 (and yes i noe i cant spell so leave me alone.)

 bye bye 

ooo ya i hate KENZIE AND REO. they can go to hell. hehehehe
                
                  !!!!!!!!!!!!YAY!!!!!!!!!!!!

i went over Cheses' the other day and it was fun.
But we were bored im mean really bored so we started do like really stupid stuff. it was fun in the end tho. So i ended up spending the night. Cheses is the most awsomest guy i noe. sometimes its kinda scary how a like we are. well except that hes a dude. But we ended up sneaking out and going to Hathco. that was preety fun cuz we went swiming in the pound. that water is so nasty and it got my hair all "yuckish." but when we got back his brother was there so that made things different.

But now i am home sitting on my ass at my computure listening to music and amussing myself. fun.

I HATE TIANA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 - w.s.k.s.f.m.p.w.a.c.o.t.i.a.b.y.

o...

i was at the carnival in st.chareles. and there was a game were you could win bunnies. and so i play one game.
but i didnt win. (but there was this bitch carni there. she was really annoying.)

but the naxt day we went back for a softball game. and the carnival wasnt open yet. and under the trailers there we a whole bunch of little bunnies! and i caught one after a really long time. but the bitch carni was all "where do you think you goin with me bunny!!" (and then there was big argument) but in the end i took the bunny. and so now i have a bunny! i named i rass as in rassbery. cuz yeah thats what the eyes look like. and it peed on me. yuck.

the last time i had a bunny its name was snowflake. and my mum painted the inside of the house and i TOLD her to take it out side but NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOBODY listens to me! and BAM! it died of the paint fuems. 

but i have to convence my mum to let me keep it cuz right now its at my dads and my dog will eat it. (he used to be a hunter) 

the other day at conceling we got on the topic that i was bothered by my parents not being together. but im not. and they wont listen to me!!!!!! i like them not being together. its a lot easier. and i get things. if my dad says no my mum says yes. if my mum says no my dad says yes. i win bother ways. mwwhahahaaaa. 

.control freak.

tommarow i get to go to the St.Charels carni!!! i love the carni. soo soo soo soo fun. i remember last time i went i had just ate some frys and i went on the magic carpet thingy. and i was sitting next to Daniel and i trew up on his shoes. lmao. 


soo hotttt.


i have nothing to say. nothing is happening. uggh. 

im playing 21 questions with evan e.

ARGHHH! i hate evan holmes!!!!  she had a skirt on the other day and her leggs were open. ewwwwwwwww did not need to see that. close thoes you lil hooker. 
evan h. : "LIKE OMG LIKE OMG! LIKE I KNOW! LIKE LIKE LIKE LIKE LIKE LIKE UMMM I CANT BELIVE IT!!"

and amanda is hhhhhhhhhhhhhooooooooooooooooooorrrrrrrrrrrrrrrriiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiibbbbblllllleeee
shoot me please... 
i cant stand her.

and marium is being bitchy and mean. she dosent need to take her problems out on me. pmsing problem dont need to be taken out on me!!!!!!!!!!!!!  keep them to ur self marium!!!!!!!!!!!!!

uhhhgg...

carni tommorow.

i gonna grow up to be a carni...

i havent up dated for about a month. long long long long long long long long long long month. horrible sad month. a sucky month. but its all good

oo ya and i went shopping! ( I NEVER GO SHOPPING)
 
i got some pants and a tiara from hottopic and s'more braclets.
then i got some shoes.
then some cds 
Then the best thing of all! OSCAR THE GROUCH SLIPPERS!

when i got out of the car today it was raining really hard so i was soaked.

i love art! and art history! such the bomb. its so fun. i hate it when people say that you dont learn anything from the concentration "ART" theyre so iggnorant. 


a few weeks ago i ran away. but it didnt really work. cuz i only ran away for about 5 hours. bummer.

Chirstina and Peter are going out!! yay! so cute. and hes so in love with her. he wont stop talking about her. today in rounds he annouced in frount of the whole class and in fount of mr.fledman   " I LOVE CRISTINA " her face turned pink the red and then her cheeks turned purple! lmao

today sucked.
numbers of problems.

contact rolled in back of my eye again so i couldnt see worth shit.
then bre and christina got in a fight. i hate bre. one day i will skin her like an animal and then glue her hair to her face, scoop her eyes out with ice cream scooper, pick at her bones, and much more. 
when i got home i was practicing my splits and there was a tac on the floor and it like shoved in my leg. little fucker.
then a few days ago i went to the doctor and he told me i had depression. god damn dick, i could have told him that. 
then i have to go and get that allergie test shit. ooo i hate neddles. they will poke in my back. ive been scared of needles my whole life. probably because i was trammatized.
i remember going to the doctors when i was about 4 and the nures was chasing me around the room. then there was this other time when the doctor the nures my mom and my dad were all holding me down.and i was kicking and screaming. it gave me a bloody nose, because it made me so nervouse.

then in art we have these new sets and i hate mine. i hate amanda. she so annoying. and she goes thro my stuff and it like !!!BITCH BACK OFF!!! then on the other side of me sits Armondo. he doesnt really bother me cuz all he does is swirl his pen around around around and around. its like hes doing that thing off of the ring. o well his bussnass. then he smerks a lot. that drives me nuts. cuz i never noe what the fuck hes smerking about. and he was biting his nails. i sware to god, ill just cut them for him god damnit. chew chew chew chew chew. ugg. 

hemm.

im sick of all guys right now. except peter cuz hes the only one you can talk to normaly. the rest stare at ur boobs the whole time. "hello im up here"

()()()()()()()()()()

i have lots of others to say so ill update later.

i got my hair cut and it looks really bad.
but my highlights (that i regret getting) arent so light now
thank god.

You belong in the land of darkness, otherwise known
as one of the worlds in which I dwell. All here
is beauty inspired by tragedy and great sorrow.
Write or go through other creative outlets to
express the anguish you may be feeling, and
never let anyone tell you that you are just
being 'weepy' or full of 'teenage angst'(if
you're a teenager.If not, then they really
should be punished for calling you one. They
probably are trying to insult your
maturity...fools.)and always remain yourself,
dark and amazing. Never change.

Where do you belong?(ANIME IMAGES)
brought to you by Quizilla

You are a moon shadow. With the moon as your source
you are a being of great mystery. Constantly
drifting, you descend into darkness to conceal
your brokenness. You have come to believe that
you are the only one you can rely upon for
constancy and safety that you need. But those
who know how to see you find enchanting beauty
in your wistfulness and fragility. It is to
them that you should flee, for their arms are
an open haven where your true light can finally
thrive..(please rate my quiz cuz it took me for
freaking ever to create)

wow

damn.

i hate my mom right now.
she yells at me and stuff, but that dosent bother me.
its when we get into an argument and she start going off and then i go off and shit. and then im the one i troble for no fucking reason.
i was getting ready to go to my dads and she started yelling at me for something i dont remember what. and then i a whole bunch of shit happened. and then i couldnt go to my dads.
she started to go off on me again. about how im grounded and that im not helping myself. I'VE BEEN GROUNDED SINCE SEPTEMBER! how can it get better? my life really sucks.

i wish i would run away. maybe move to new york. 

naw.wouldnt work. they would stop me then take me back. no matter what i cant get away.
only at school i am.
im starting to like school for some odd reason.
its the only place i can be myself.

i wish i was addopted. or had a brother or sister, then i wouldnt get blamed so much for things i didnt do.
she blame things on me. things i didnt do. things i dont know about. things that i couldnt do anyway. nope. i still get blamed.

i cant wait till the summer.
then i can go outside till 11:00pm and when i get home just do whatever and not have to see all these people.

not get blamed.

i cant deal with all of this stuff. its too much.

i cried for so long last night.
i dont remember why.
all the problems are too much.
its all too much.
everyone thinks im a happy kind off person.
no one realizes all of it.
i learned one thing, to keep your problems to yourself.
if you tell people things then they tell people.
and they dont understand.
no one understands.
